text:
I don't like writing average reviews but honesty is the best. Converted to USD we paid 3,023.00 for a 7 night stay in a 2 bedroom villa. That's rounded to 432.00 per night which is large. I would have expected something absolutely outstandingly fantastic for that amount of money. 

It's a pre fabricated villa built on a complex of villas in a secure compound. The villa is well enclosed and you can't see out of your area when you are at home. Unlike a stand alone villa, though, there are other guests surrounding you in the complex from all angles just over the walls and with that the noise that goes with it. Initially we moved to another 2 bedroom villa on the complex instead of the one we booked because on arrival the one we booked was neighboured by loud screaming. 

You need to be very very very resilient to deal with the noise, which I'm not. Even after moving, the villa next door was full of people who thumped music out on full blast and shouted so loudly that it shook the foundations of the house in the afternoons and early evenings, luckily they went out at 6pm most days and didn't come back until the early afternoons to start it up again. On the other side there were screaming kids to wake you up nice and early and always a noise in background involving internal operations in the complex or loud bass music from surrounding villas. That's all fine if you can ignore it, but I was looking for a quiet spot with minimal interruption with maximum relaxation which this is not. If you're staying on a resort/ complex you have to be prepared for some noise made by the variety of visitors that stay there but this was very noisy.

The villa was maintained very well, always cleaned and housekeeping do a great job of keeping the rooms, gardens and pool clean and I can't fault that. They restocked the soaps etc when needed and kept all towels topped up with fresh ones. That's a big plus as I don't like having to ask for extra towels and amenities so for service it's great. The complex itself was also well maintained - everything cleaned and scrubbed well and the reception area nice and fresh.

The location itself is great for Seminyak - you can walk to the main square in minutes and most local places are a walk away. The main concierge were very helpful and whenever we rang them the requests were done straight away. Mosquitoes are indeed a pain as always but that's what you get anywhere in Bali and they sent people round every day to fumigate and keep them as controlled as possible including giving you sprays to top up when needed so they did as best they could to control the bugs.

The pool is large and the surrounding garden is built to a nice standard with easy access to rooms and a nice top area to sit as well.

The 3 star review is based on the overall experience. It's a hugely expensive rental for what it is and very noisy, which was disappointing. The noise element is something you might have to expect with a complex I guess and so for the huge cost of the villa I won't be doing it again and staying in a stand alone independent villa instead. Last time we stayed in a place that was twice as big, less expensive and much quieter in pretty much the same location which I will do next time. 

The reason it didn't get a 2 star was that the service and housekeeping was decent which bumped up the score so that was a good element. However, for what you get for your top end money it doesn't make the cut I'm afraid compared to what you can get elsewhere for the same cost and something much better all round.
title: Hugely expensive and noisy for what it is but good service

owner_response.text:
Dear BaldyBaldyBaldy,
Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor.  Although we prefer positive comments, feedback such as yours provides us with an opportunity to evaluate and improve our facilities and services.  We are delighted to hear that you felt the villa and property was well maintained, clean, and that you liked the location and the villa itself, and felt the service was good. 
We regret to hear that you were unaware that The Layar was a Villa Complex, where the villas do have neighbors.   We are sorry to hear that your villa stay was extremely loud and that in both villas you stayed, your neighbors were extremely noisy.  We are disappointed you felt the villa was expensive and that for the price you paid there was too much noise from the other villas.  Though the Layar does do noise controls in the evenings after 10 pm, based on your feedback we will consider how we can best manage the noise levels to please our both our guests seeking peace and quiet and those that prefer a bit of entertainment around their villa.
Thank you again for your valuable feedback.

text:
The Villa was amazing, the service was great and the location is spot on for the remedy Semeniyak area. 

We stayed in the 1 bedroom Villa, it's the smallest they offer and at the time of booking I didn't realise there will be any difference to the other Villas. In a 1 bedroom Villa you don't get a jacuzzi, the layout is across ground floor and has no mezzanine and the swimming pool is smaller but to be fair the pool was big enough for its purpose. The 1 bedroom swimming at its deepest is 1.7m whereas the bigger Villas have 2m depths. It's also smaller in legnths but I don't know the exact measurements. 

Before booking I was also concerned about the 'open living' set up like a few others on here, my take on it;

- Mosquitos and other bugs - I was very surprised to find this wasn't an issue at all. We went in May and whilst they were flying around we didn't have a single bite in the week we stayed. The hotel are fantastic at spraying repellents they sprayed our Villa every evening inside and out and the do a weekly spray of the entire complex which seems to do the trick. There are also other bugs, small frogs are common, we also saw 1 caterpillar and 1 gecko but these are rare. 

Living room - Yes the living room is hot, it is open after all with no air con. They do provide a fan that blows cold air, we liked the humidity so didn't really use the fan. This comes down to personal preference so not much more I can add. What was nice however, taking a night time swim obviously keeps you cool too :)

Showers - I can conclusive say there is no closed off shower/bathroom area all bathrooms are open to the elements. I actually booked the Villa thinking the ensuites were closed off but ended up really enjoying the open element of it. 

Privacy - all Villas are advertised as completely private but our villa (3B) was overlooked by another Villa at the back. We informed the staff and they immediately erected a barrier to close it off. It may be that hedges grow over this section that normally provides a visual barrier. Just something to be conscious off when you book. 

Generally the stay was amazing staff were very helpful. We would absolutely go back.
title: Amazing Villa, trully exceptional

text: We stayed at this lovely property in March 2018 as part of our 2018 trip to Bali.  We were joined by another two couples, so we shared a three bedroom villa.  'Wow' was was the word we entered the courtyard.  The pool was beautiful, very large with a spa - very inviting and sparkling clean.  Off the pool was a grassed area and large deck area.  The living area was also large and had every conceivable luxury anyone could ask for.  All three bedrooms were over-sized with their own bathroom and courtyard.  The 'main bedroom' which was the one we were in, was one of the biggest rooms I have ever seen with an equally large inside/outside bathroom, spa bath and shower.  The villa was located not too far off Eat Street and not too far from the beach.  The property provides the service of a shuttle to the Seminyak area, which we used a few times.  Breakfasts were included and these were served in their restaurant up the front of the property.  The food was top class and made to order.  Coffee was great too.  There is no gym on the premises but one 'around the corner'.  This is a large gym, (a little more than around the corner) but we did use it and it was excellent with a large lap pool and classes.  So all in all, we would definitely recommend The Layar to anyone seeking a bit of serenity and luxury.
title: Amazing Villas

owner_response.text:
Dear Mrs Yu Jiang,

I understand that my response will have absolutely no impact on your opinion, however, it may provide some sense for the vast majority of people.

I will apologize once again to you for the two very small slightly dis-colored  marks on the bed cover in your villa.  Whilst this is certainly not acceptable, unfortunately, without providing brand new linens and duvets to all guests some small marks may appear over time, and we have a spot cleaning program to deal with these, however, it seems in this instance these spots were missed.  Our housekeeping team had the affected items removed and replaced within 20 minutes of your phone call -  certainly not what I would call reluctant.

It is unfortunate that your baby didn’t like breakfast – perhaps you should have ordered him/her something he/she would have liked?  With over 25 different breakfast options and our willingness to custom something I am sure we could have found something he/she liked.  If you inform the housekeeping and in-villa dining staff to not enter the Villa and that you will call when you wish to have the villa serviced, then place the Do Not Disturb sign on, and then don’t call us to service the villa ; then yes the dishes will be left in the sink.

Our entire team here at The Layar are proud of our resort, and take great pains to ensure all of our guests enjoy their holiday.  Moreover, as a small boutique property we can easily cater to our guests needs and wants that vary from our standard practices, unfortunately, in your case we could do no right.

Best of luck to you in your future holidays.


Best Regards,

Andrew J Leith | General Manager

text:
Amazing Service! Thoroughly enjoyed our stay at The Layar! Our first night we landed late at the airport at about 10pm, we were picked up by the hotel and greeted with friendly service. We checked in about 11pm, and was hungry, and nothing was open accept Boss Burgers in Seminyak which closed at 1am. Normally they have delivery service but were short staffed, we planned on walking out but it started to rain. The Hotel staff offered to go pick up our burgers and take it back to us at no additional cost, this was amazing so thank-you!

Tailored service to suit, every morning for 3 nights we go breakfast served in the privacy of our own villas, and they even provided us with a unicorn for the pool! 

The rooms are well thought out architecturally, clean and vibrant. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay, thank-you guys!

Will be back!!

text:
That’s right, it’s the first time ever I feel compelled to write a review while still at the place I’m reviewing.... simply because it is such a clear 5 star rating for this property, no discussion. 
The Layar is not amazing ... it’s spectacular, it’s everything I ever wanted in a villa in Bali. 
The staff are 6 star, the villa is clean, well maintained and very spacious. Wifi is top notch, super location and food is great. The Layar is relaxing and luxurious yet so close to the hustle and bustle, the restaurants and the shopping. Comfortable beds, warm pool and jacuzzi, manicured gardens, great showers and hot water, spacious kitchen with quality appliances, icy airco, luxury bathrooms, etc.
Did I mention the staff are out of this world? I did, but I just did again! Nothing is too much for them and even the smallest issue is rectified immediately.
I thoroughly recommend this property as the best I stayed at so far in Seminyak.... to be honest I’m sure to book again for my next trip! 
Thank you everyone at The Layar, you made my holiday!!!! When I leave next week, it will be with a heavy heart!
title: There’s always a first

text: My friends and I booked this property from 24-26 Nov for a class reunion. When news about the impending volcanic eruption broke, more than 6 weeks before the start of the stay, we decided to cancel the booking on advice of Indonesian friends and because some of us suffer from respiratory ailments. We asked for our deposit back due to the extraordinary circumstances but the property steadfastly refused, not even agreeing to a voucher for a future visit. As it turned out, the volcano duly erupted right in the middle of the dates we had booked and the airport was closed exactly on the day we were supposed to return. We will never stay in this property as their crassly money-minded policies have shown exactly where their priorities lie - definitely not with the customer. I have been a frequent visitor to Bali and this is the worst experience I've had with any establishment there.
title: Inflexible and unreasonable

owner_response.text:
Dear Jutanlc,

We are sorry you felt aggrieved for not getting your 20% deposit back as you decided not to visit the beautiful island of Bali where we live.

We did remind you that as per our booking terms you agreed with at the time of booking that cancellation will forfeit the deposit that you paid, but you still decided to cancel. 

With the airport open and flights in normal operation at that time and the island full of tourists, it is difficult for the owner to waive this as he has turned away other bookings but please contact us if you decide to come at some later date and we will be delighted to ask the owner to host you at a very special rate.

text: Having returned to The Layar (as we enjoyed it so much a few years ago) we were disappointed to find basically everything had dropped in standard except the price. Compared to other hotels reception staff were indifferent (we were not asked once how our stay was going or can they help with anything).   The breakfast had been cut back (cereal or eggs not both) and inroom delivery soggy and luke warm. The restuarant breakfast whilst from the same menu was fresh, hot and nice coffee. The Villas are tranquil but much in need of some investment. The pool lounge is uncomfortable, pool deck about to give way in places, air conditioner rattles at night,  sheets are not changed every night (and had holes in which is unacceptable for the price) and towels not always changed. Lots of staff but unclear what they actually do and unclear who the Manager was if at all. I might be harsh but so much competition in Seminyak we will try something else next time.
title: Doesn't live up to the price.

We would like to assure you that we strive our best to deliver the same, if not, better service with each guest stay and that our prices remain competitive in the market. We do update our breakfast offerings periodically to offer variety, plus also offer the option to dine in villa or at the restaurant. Again, thank you for leaving your feedback for The Layar – Designer Villas and Spa.

text:
1. No Butler on site
2. Poor housekeeping maintenance - a lot of fallen leaves in the bathtub, no shampoo & shower gel in one of the rooms, lots of spider web in the garden, dusty in some areas like it hasn't been clean for awhile.
3. F&B- slow service, table next to us who came later got their food sooner than us, repeatedly forgot our juices & coffees, no prawn in the fried rice but the prawn was written in the menu description
title: Poor housekeeping and F&B service

owner_response.text:
Dear jiawen,

Thank you for having time to review The Layar - Designer Villas and Spa.

I would like to clarify that you are correct  - our butler staff do not reside in the Villa with our guests, however, are based in the lobby area so they can take action accordingly when the guests call reception - we are sorry for any confusion

I apologize for your regrettable experiences with our housekeeping and FB services.  Unfortunately we cannot have a member of our housekeeping team standing by 24 hours to check if the wind blows leaves into our outdoor bathtubs – we apologize for this and am glad that they were cleaned away by the housekeeping team twice daily.  The spiders in the gardens are busy little creatures and it is sometimes hard to keep up with them - I do hope that they did not stop you from enjoying fresh air, natural plants, grass, and gardens in your Villa.   I do apologize that there was no soap and shampoo in one of the bathrooms, obviously our standard set up is to have bathroom amenities in all our bathrooms and am dismayed that this was not the case.  In regard to your comments on our Food & Beverage department I do apologize if you felt that we were favoring a particular table over yours, however, on occasion some dishes do take less time to prepare than others so tables are not always served in the order their orders were taken in.  I can assure you that there is prawn in our Nasi Goreng as per the recipe and menu description, however, if you felt there was a problem with the dish we would have more than happily replaced it for you had you brought this to our attention to our staff.  It is sad indeed to hear that our wait staff repeatedly forgot your coffee and juices, this, again, is obviously not our common practice and I have reminded and retrained our wait staff on how to take a guest order effectively and efficiently.

I do hope that you managed to enjoy some of your holiday despite the lapses in service that you encountered during your time with us.

Kind Regards,
Anton Budiono
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We had a wonderful stay at The Layar.  5 adults in a 3 bedroom villa was ideal.  Rooms were spacious, simple yet tastefully furnished.  There was a TV room upstairs which made the Villa different to many we have stayed at before.  It became our 'social' room, however, there were lots of mosquitos!  Our private pool was huge !  One downside I would say, was the dining area but that wasn't a real problem.  The Layar have their own restaurant where we enjoyed daily breakfast. Menu wasn't extensive but the quality was very good.  We rented a car and were able to park it just outside our villa which was very convenient.  The staff were very courteous and on the ball.  I would recommend The Layar to those not on a budget and want to pay more for luxury and quality.

text:
Usually adverse to staying in villa complex's, i approached The Layar with a certain amount of trepidation. I was travelling to Bali to meet a girlfriend from HK, who was like me overworked and stressed and needed a few days downtime and quite relaxation.
The location of The Layar is a big plus - on the other side of JL Petititenget - between shortcut to JL Oberoi.
The layout of the complex means the villas are a long way from the main road, so noise is not an issue. The villa's are a great size - although the pools could be bigger, the layout works. Bathrooms and Bedrooms are well sized and there is a separate dining - living and media room (which would work well with kids and movie time etc)
The restaurant at the front of the hotel serves ala cart breakfast each day, so you can eat in or have delivered everything from frittata, to avocado and sourdough and eggs a million ways. I'ts actually a great breakfast and I was really impressed.

Super handy is the buggy which can take you into Seminyak complimentary between 7am and 7pm each day. if you are popping into W for cocktails or Amo spa for nails and hair etc - it is super easy with the buggy and doesn't cost a cent!

If travelling with smaller kids it is important to note that the pool is not fenced and it literally is a dive into the pool from the living room scenario..

The Layar gets a thumbs up from me. Look at it as a short stay alternative if you want a n extra bit of service and a really good location.

So order a in room foot massage and lie back on a comfy chair and chill out for 60 minutes of foot massage bliss...
title: Seminyak Secret

owner_response.text:
Dear ShanghaiPatty ,

Thank you for taking time to review The Layar - Designer Villas and Spa

We appreciate your feedback that The Layar - Designer Villas and Spa’s location is a big plus,  and the layout of our villa complex that is a long way from main road so noise is not an issue. We are happy that you found the villa layout great, well-designed, and size of our villa’s bathrooms and bedrooms large.  We agree the media room does work well with kids and movie time.

We are  happy to hear that you had a great breakfast and impressed by our a la cart menu at our rustic Italian restaurant - Settimo Cielo. Our complimentary drop off service to the surrounding Seminyak area is very popular for its ease of use, convenience, and yes, because its free!!!

We care with guests who travel with kids., our lawn and pool area providing lovely space for play – there’s even a special shallow section for paddlers (safety fences are available for hire). In fact, you don’t need to worry about packing any of the usual cumbersome kids’ equipment for your stay: just let us know what you need and anything we don’t have in-house we will source on your behalf.

Thank you for having time to write this review, and we look forward to welcoming you back at The Layar - Designer Villas and Spa.

Regards,
Anton Budiono

text:
Having just arrived back in Melbourne after a fabulous week or so in Bali. 

I stayed in a couple of Villa's, 20 and 16, both 3BR. All the Villa's are amazing and would have to rate as some of the best accommodation have ever stayed in. 

I spent 1 night in Villa 20 with the master bedroom. HUGE. As big as my 2BR apartment at home. Open spacious bathroom and and rainfall shower. 

The rest of the week I spent at Villa 16 and again I believe I had the master bedroom. 

Big spacious showers that led straight into the garden, enormous bedroom and only downside was the aircon was a bit weak for my liking, however my girlfriend didnt think so. 

The entire Villa was well serviced, cleaned everyday with breakfast delivered. My advise, order dinner the night before and if possible order the same meal each time, they seem to get confused and the meals varied, but this is not unexpected. 

The pool was great and lead straight into the living spaces, make sure to put down a towel or dry off, as I had a little tumble late one night. The grounds are nice as well. 

Overall, a simply stunning villa and would certainly recommend to anyone looking to escape the  hussell and bussel of Seminyak.
title: A Wedding and Holiday

text:
I stayed in the 3 bedroom villa with my family in June.  There are really no complaints about the property, it's generously spaced and tastefully designed.  We did however face a few hiccups:

1. Because the villa has an open concept, the entire living room was infested with mosquitoes starting from 6pm onwards.  We asked for some mosquito coils but they were not very useful.  This is a pity because it makes the lovely open living area not habitable in the evenings.

2. The wifi just stopped working a few days into our stay and when we called for help, the answer was that the problem was "not fixable".

Aside from the above few points which hopefully can be easily fixed, the service staff is friendly and the facilities excellent for a villa.
title: Great villa, good value for money, just need some tweaks...

text:
Here's the hits:
1) lovely architecture...a dream to stay for families, lovers, friends
2) BBQ dinner with personal chef is a must try! It was the highlight of our trip with friends there!
3) The Layar signature breakfast is a must order (as part of their free breakfast choices)
4) We requested for a late checkout as our flight was at 6pm - though we couldn't stay in our villa 8, we were shifted to a smaller villa from 12-3pm which was a nice touch!
4) dreamy toilets

Here's the misses:
1) What was extremely disappointing in the breakfast choices was their local breakfast rice dish - do not order - they do better with their western breakfasts
2) they have to get their kids meal portions right.  On our first night when we arrived at 8pm, we ordered in.  When we ordered a kids meal which was chicken fingers, we had a big plate served with just 3 strips of breaded chicken!  Isn't this a meal?  How can a kid be full just on 3 strips of breaded chicken?  It should be called starters or sides.
3) Given the tough competition outside in terms of spa offering, I was quite surprised to find their messages and spa services quite pricy which made us end up going outside for better offers
4) airport transfers were pricey
title: Some hits and misses

owner_response.text:
Dear The Layar - Designer Villas and Spa guest,

Thank you for taking your time to write this review. We do appreciate your  feedback and keep it as motivation for further improvement.

We appreciate your full rating score for rooms and above average rating for sleep quality . We trust that our building architecture and interior design will be an amazing place for every guest who stays in our property. Our in-villa BBQ is another exceptional services that got many compliments from our guests when they did it on our lush garden or just the simple one on the pool deck. We do provide complimentary late checkout based on availability on the last day of the guest stay as part of our services. Our bathroom and toilets are specially design to be what you called “dreamy toilets“. 

We do improve our breakfast services and quality to meet our guest’s expectation. We are happy when you told us and other reviewers that The Layar signature breakfast is a must order. However, we apologize if our Indonesian rice breakfast and kids menu are disappointing at your end. We take your feedback seriously and will discuss with our chef to improve on this part.

Our spa menu price are worth for value as we use premium quality of natural products and certificated therapist that will guarantee the overall spa experience in your own private villa. Our spa and massage service are comparable to other premium spas and are cheaper than any similar  property in the Seminyak area

We cooperate with drivers suggested from the local community for all transportation of The Layar guests.  The price that we charge comes to equal with cleanliness, car performance and comfort.  By the way airport transfers are cheaper than similar property in the Seminyak area.

Once again thank you for sharing your opinion with our readers and reviewers. Please feel free to contact our GM at gm@thelayar.com or me directly fom@thelayar.com

Regards,
Anton Budiono

text:
Booked 3 Room Villa on 27 - 29 stayed at Villa 17.
Check in at 15.00 , have to wait for another 30 Minutes. Check out suppose to be at 12.00 but they waited 11.00 at the front door . Seems like they are Rushing us to check out as soon as possible. 
Breakfast is a hell , they serve us 2 piece of small bacon , 1 small piece of sausage. asked for more bacon , they say there is extra charge  , Even extra charge for more Orange Juice. they used instant noodle to cook for Fried noddle
Asked for baby cord, paid for 10Usd ++ per day for ugly dirty baby cord. Got a free 10 Minute massage , booked for 8pm . they told use we used the free massage on 1 day before we check in .they should check everything first before talk to the customer. but they gave us the free service which they should. Other than that , it is a clean Villa.
title: Not even a 3 Star , Xtra charge for everything

owner_response.text:
Dear The Layar - Designer Villas and Spa guest,
Thank you for your feedback and taking your time to write this review. We do take critics seriously and as a motivation for our further improvement.
We appreciate your higher than average rating and positive comment on our cleanliness. Please accept our sincere apologies in the matter of late check in as this is not our common practice. Our standard check in time is at 2PM.  We normally handle all check in process in about 5 to 10 minutes. However in case of multiple check in and other circumstances like groups check in, after the identification of the guest we normally  propose the guest to proceed to the villa,  leaving all passports at reception  to process all the necessary registrations in order to minimize the waiting time. It is a standard procedure for guests traveling from overseas, especially the guests with long flight. We have some guests that prefer to wait in the reception until their documents are processed for their convenience. 
We always strive to ensure that overall experience of our guests are amazing starting from the first step they come into our lobby. Our standard check-out time is at 12 noon which commons in other hotel and villa resorts on the island. Villa butler and housekeeping are stand by and wait patiently outside of the villa just in case the guests need help  for luggage or any other assistance before they leave the villa. No staff is allowed to enter the villa unless the guest requests before check out time. We do apologies if this caused other impression at your end. 
We value your constructive feed back about extra charge for breakfast. We would like to clarify that we provide breakfast for 2 persons  in each bedroom. The number of breakfast will increase as the guest book more bedroom number of  villa. We provides 6 breakfasts for 3 bedroom villa booking that we believe you got during your stay at The Layar. In this case, we found that there was 8 adults and 2 kids staying at the villa with 2 extra beds, therefor we provided the total of 8 breakfast at your villa . We do provide additional breakfast for kids and adults if required at additional cost. I personally thinks that there was a miscommunication with our staff as in our practice there is no extra charge for extra bacons, juices and other breakfast items. We apologies for this inconvenience and we will improve our staff comprehension of communication to avoid the same situation in the future.
Regarding your feed back of instant noodles. I would like to clarify that we definitely  do not use instant noodles due to the taste and quality consideration. In addition for other travelers and readers on trip advisor, we serve freshly squeezed juices and daily baked French croissant in a selection of our breakfast menu. We apologise if our breakfast does not meet your requirements and we will always improve our breakfast to be better in the future.   
 The Layar Designer Villa and Spa offers welcome drink refreshment for guest at lobby and  other  services in the villa including  welcome massage, unlimited WiFi connection, unlimited mineral water in the villa, free late checkout based on last day availability, fully equipped kitchen, coffee and tea, bathroom amenities, mosquito repellent, buggy transfers in villa complex, DVD player, sound system with iPod connector, and international satellite TV channels . The complimentary 10 minutes massage that we offer to guests can be redeemed based on the availability of our spa therapists as they also handle in-villa guests spa arrangement. In this case, you can take the complimentary massage  anytime during your stay at The Layar – Designer Villas and Spa based on our availability. We normally offer the available times and the guests decide which one is suitable for them.
Once again thank you for sharing your opinion with our readers and reviewers. Please feel free to contact our general manager at gm@thelayar.com or me directly fom@thelayar.com if you have any queries.

Best Regards,
Anton Budiono

The pool runs quite cool , very refreshing , a lot better than other Bali pools , alway feel like bathwater , this one is way better. Breakfasts were excellent as well..

text:
We stayed in a three bedroom pool villa. The design of the villas are very modern and have a great flow from indoors to the outside ,maximising the benefit of the huge flower filled gardens and massive private pool. 
I wasn't as keen on the half indoor/outdoor bathrooms mainly because trying to put on makeup and style your hair in stifling humidity and whilst fighting off the mosquitoes in there isn't the most fun I've ever had.
That aside though, the villas are very spacious, well equipt and overall very comfortable, we had some amazing massages in the comfort of our villa from the layer staff.
i also tried a healing therapy from an outside therapist which sounded great but in reality is very pricey , and all you do is lie in the dark in silence with the therapist who just holds his hand under the small of your back and over your tummy for 45 mins! maybe i am more together than i thought as i can't say i felt any different after it and couldn't help feel a little ripped off after the experience ( or rather non experience)
The in house massages however were very reasonably priced and extremely relaxing so id suggest the layer ditches the more outlandish , alternative therapies and offers more variation from their own masseurs where the treatments do exactly what it says on the tin.
The staff were courteous and helpful , the only bad part of the stay was that a pair of my lounge pants , vanished from the villa which was a bit disappointing but didn't detract from the overall enjoyment of the stay.
the main area i think needs some work is the food. The breakfasts, in theory is good as the food is prepared and then brought to your own villa each morning from your personal order placed the day before, but in reality we were often brought something different from that which we had put on our order and the food was at best lukewarm, thought the selection of daily pastries etc  were nice. it wasn't too terrible but by the end of the stay we were all a bit over it and wishing for a better variety and better quality. 
If you are planning a holiday as couples  , say three couples in a three bed villa this would be a very cost effective way to enjoy some quite fancy living and everything is just a cheap taxi ride away with some nice restaurants nearby!
title: Good , with room for improvement

text:
From the moment you arrive at the lobby you can tell this property is all class. After a quick check in you are transported to your villa by electric car which is silent, I was however disappointed when I was told I couldn't take it for a drunken joy ride through Seminyak.

The presentation of the villas are excellent. Breakfast was served each morning by the pool which was lovely. The staff where only a short call to reception away when ever we wanted/needed anything. The sound system in the lounge room area is much better for waking up the people in the villas either side of you then the one in the kitchen. 

The lights around the pool area did not work and the lights around the outside area, well only half of those worked. The air conditioner in the rooms is terrible but apart from that everything else was good.
title: Spectacular villas near the heart of Seminyak

text: Hi , We stayed here during 2013 new years eve week. Rooms and service is great. In room dining food is horrible and always served cold. In house spa is nice. Nice amenities. location is excellent as well. Heart of seminyak.
title: PROPERTY IS GREAT, HORRIBLE FOOD

text: We came here for our honeymoon and chose to stay at a 1 bedroom villa. Upon arrival got an upgrade to a 2 bedroom villa. Although unnecessary for a honeymoon couple it was a very thoughtful gesture. The villas are very nicely furnished and well maintained. Staff are very friendly and room service is not too bad either. My only complaint would be the resident lizard in the kitchen that would never leave but that would be expected from the open setting of the villa. Apart from that the stay was perfect. An entire silent day was spent inside the villa with ease. Would definitely recommend
title: Nice modern villa with great service

The layar villas memang menyediakan kolam renang tepat didepan setiap villa....

text: Ok I know someone said they felt the villas were dated but we visited many villa while here to decide where to come next time. Including Karma Kandara and The W and The Layer has just so much space and privacy it's great. The staff could not be more helpful. We stayed in No.15 a 2 BR and have really enjoyed our stay. Thank you The Layar for being such great hosts and making our stay unforgettable this is my 4th visit to Bali and each time I've tried to stay somewhere a little better. text:
We booked one of the 4 bed villas over nye. It was pricey but the service and accommodation was excellent. On New Year's Eve our restaurant booking fell through and the staff even organized catering with 3 hours notice for a group of 18 people. Staff we're very attentive and polite and we're very good considering full occupancy. 
On the negatives- Phone in main area and bell didn't work and we had an hour delay on check in. All minor inconveniences really although if we didn't have local phones to call the reception from, it would have been an expensive call when we needed anything.
title: Expensive but very good

text:
The villas are spacious, but quite dated in comparison to other hotels and villas that are available in Seminyak for a similar price. 

We had many minor issues that compounded to make our stay pretty average compared to other times we had stayed in Seminyak. To begin with, the air conditioning was completely inadequate for the time of year, we had it running full pelt, yet still required a portable fan to cool the bedroom down at night. We had no hot water for three days, which wasn't a disaster, given the heat, but this really should have been picked up by the staff before we got in there and had to complain about it. The design of the villas is not great, for instance, the toilets and bathroom are quite old and are only partitioned from the dining area by a roll-up blind. The breakfast was pretty ordinary, although we were given large quantities, it had obviously been sitting around for a while before reaching us, this was evident by the food frequently being cold, wrapped in silver fool to try and keep it warm and served on soggy toast. Not uncommonly we found the dirty breakfast dishes still sitting around late in the afternoon upon returning to the villa after we had been out for the day. One time they had even attracted birds which were eating from the kitchen table! The internet often dropped out, requiring us to continually restart the wireless modem.
Other private villas we have stayed at in the same area going for a similar price, had complimentary transport to beach, restaurants, bars airport etc... However the Layar does not have this facility, and you need to either walk, taxi or supply your own transport. Having said all this, the staff were extremely friendly and obviously at times were trying quite hard to please us throughout our entire stay. However this does not really make up for the comparative lack of facilities.

In summary, the place is dated, and not really worth the money asked for, especially given the high quality of other private villas that are available in the same area for similar prices. I wouldn't stay here again because we have had better experiences at other villas/spas at a similar cost.
title: Expensive for what you ultimately get

text: We're staying in Villa 12 with three spacious bedrooms - all with cable TV, bathtubs and outdoor showers. One of the slightly smaller bedroom connects directly to the private pool, as well as the living area. There is a jacuzzi next to the pool. The roof is shaped like a sail or "layar", hence the name. The garden around the villa is beautiful. We love the fully-equipped kitchen and the big fridge. Juicer, and other cooking utensils, as well as dinnerware are all there. There's a coffee plunger, too, but you gotta bring your own beans and grinder - which we did! (Oh well, we even brought our own Aeropress and Kalita Wave.) No Nespresso, but there are some hideous instant coffee - if you like it. Many options for breakfast. Dining menu is not too extensive but convenient for emergency. Otherwise, the location is very close to the happening area of Oberoi, Kerobokan, Seminyak where we can get simply whatever cuisine we want. Service? Well, a butler is assigned for each villa, so who can complain? It's a recommended stay for those who seek privacy without being stranded somewhere in a secluded area of Bali.
title: Great Design and Location

Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back at The Layar - Designer Villas and Spa  sometime in the future.

text:
One of the newer villas around in Seminyak. Fantastic location, just behind "eat street". The villa is very luxurious, rooms large and great large outside bathrooms. 3 couples stayed comfortably here and hardly left the pool.
In villa beauty therapy was a highlight. Whilst a little more expensive than those places on the street - its still very cheap and well worth having it done in the comfort of your own villa.
Grocer and Grind walking distance and a great lunch and breakfast place with good coffee.
On minor point was the Wi-Fi kept dropping in and out. 
Will definitely recommend to friends and will be the place i stay next time.
title: Fantastic location and villa

text: We loved every minute of our stay here.  We've stayed at plenty of villas and hotels in Bali but the Layar is an absolute standout in so many ways and the location is about as good as you'll get (other than full beachfront). The design is stunning and apparently no two villas are the same. There is no spa as such - instead (even better I think) your treatments are done in your villa or (in my case) in our beautiful garden.  The staff are all amazing and we were treated like royalty.  We will be heading back as soon as we can!
title: Best place on earth

text:
The roof and ceiling of this villas is structurally amazing and the pool superb. You can go out for breakfast, lunch and dinner at 100's of nearby cafés and restaurants. 
The breakfast provided at the Layar needs huge improvement. The staff are great and do a good job. Beds large, though could do with more pillows and underlay. Overall very good.
title: Great private pool

owner_response.text: Thank you for your review, we are happy to hear you loved our roofs and large pools, definitely two distinctive features of our villas. We will review immediately our breakfast service to make sure our normal standard is always respected; we hope however you appreciated it is served everyday in the comfort and privacy of your villa. Thank you, and we hope to have you here again in the future.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
My daughter and her partner took me to Bali for my 80th.  I had been once before and stayed with them in a villa in Umalas which was nice.
This time we stayed at the Layar and it was fabulous.  We felt like we were in a world of our own.  It was very private and so quiet. I stayed and had my tea in the villa while they went out for dinner. There was a good room menu selection and the food was lovely.  It was very peaceful sitting by our pool and looking across our wonderful garden.
We were only a short taxi ride from some wonderful shopping and our driver took me to Ubud and to a famous temple.  He and all the staff were very pleasant and helpful.  They could not believe I was my age.  
The appointments were very comfortable and there was even a kitchen if you wished to cook for yourself.  But we never did.  How very decadent!   Oh well, back at home now in Numurkah.
I hope I can go back soon. Perhaps for my 81st.
title: Lovely villa

text:
Stayed at the Layar in September 2013. The property is new, larger than the average villa in the Yak' and overall we were quite pleased with it. 

Entertainment system, large pool, bathroom were all highlights. Bedroom was air-conditioned well and quiet (unlike other villas in Bali). Breakfast was reasonable and layout of villas was adequate. Location a plus. 

Negatives: Only stayed for a few days it was mostly positive however it would have been better if they were more welcoming to some of our helpers we had with us, they were told they cannot wait in the lobby for us and had to wait outside in the heat.

Overall a positive experience though and for the money would stay again. Not cheap but no where really is in Seminyak these days for a large sized private villa 5*.
title: Decent sized villa within the hub of Seminyak

text:
supernice villas 5 min walking from the main street of semyniak ( restaurant, shops, clubs)
brand new furnitures, cool design but still in balinese style, top service and concierge.
every villa has a private pool...best goodmorning dip under the sun and goodnite under the stars :)
wonderful days..wish I had more!
title: Top staying in Semyniak

text:
I was very lucky to come across this beautiful property. The design is very intelligent and everything works well. It's not often you get a pool this big, especially in a villa in Seminyak. And the pool also gets a lot of sun so the water is not freezing cold in the evening.
They don't have an in-house restaurant but because it's close to cool places in Seminyak, it wasn't really a problem for us. Though we have to say that they can do a little better with the breakfast. Highly recommended.
title: Villa with an intelligent design

owner_response.text: Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed staying at The Layar. We are sorry to hear the breakfast was not perfect: we only use the freshest ingredients and French croissants, and it’s all cooked at the minute; serving breakfast to all our guests directly in their villa is quite challenging, however we strive to improve our service day by day.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
My husband and I stayed at one of the one bedroom villas and had a great experience. Staff are very friendly and helpful - Bayu especially. The Villa is stunningly beautiful and spacious, I loved the modern contemporary Asian fusion design. My only issues is that the AC in the bedroom could have been cooler, I was uncomfortable the first night but managed to sleep better subsequent nights. 
Breakfast was ok at the most, nothing amazing. We did not order any room service for lunch or dinner as we were out most of the time. I would love to visit again and stay at one of the bigger villas.
title: Loved it

text:
We had a fantastic experience at the Layar.
Villas are stunningly beautiful, plenty of space and fantastic design… we could just stay there and relax the whole day…
Position is perfect, 5 minutes away from shops and restaurants in Seminyak, best place in Bali and 10 minutes from the beach
Service is real 5 star, whether it’s about food, yoga, massage… with on top of this the friendliness that can come only in a small place.
Price… well can’t call it cheap but really worth the money. I have been to places asking much more than this for not a fraction of what I got here
That was our first time there but definitely not the last one…
title: It looks beautiful in the pictures... it's even better when you're there!

text: Few weeks ago I visited Villa #12, with three bedrooms. The friendly staff welcomed us warmly. We had such a nice time. The pool is amazing. The spacious bedrooms downstairs offered me long and good night sleeps, as well the possibility to be alone and read a book. The bath rooms are exceptionally gorgeous and extremely comfortable and spacious. The lounge area next to the pool has really nice couches for afternoon drinks. The TV area next to the dinner table has comfortable and big sofas. The staff was helpful in arranging i.e. scooter rentals, taxis, dinner reservations, immigration and visa advice. We had a broad choice of breakfast every morning, but unfortunately the order went wrong a couple of times so we had to wait a bit longer for the right breakfast! The reception staff wasn't always well trained; so my advice when ordering breakfast is to speak very clearly and repeat your order at least once. I also had a very good massage, arranged by the Layar. The location is perfect; you are near shops, nice cocktail bars, coffee shops and the beach, but the tranquillity of the Layar provides pure relaxation as well.  I would definitely recommend this villa #12, as for a big family, as well for three couples or friends. I will surely be back!
title: Loved it!spacious and cosy

text:
The villas and gardens are absolutely beautiful. I have stayed in a lot of villas in Bali. But here you won't experience that claustrophobic feeling. You have a lot of space in and outside. And100% privacy.
The service is great. Location is perfect too!
title: Outstanding!

text: We found the villas great food and staff very friendly and villas clean and tidy. Overall a great experience the spar and massage was wonderful !!! The whole place was being painted and upgraded and we were mover to another villa when work was undertaken nothing was too much trouble
title: what a great place to stay

text:
I booked 11 nights at the layar with wifey, helper and 3 young children. Wen we saw pictures of the layar I realised that I had to stay here but I was a little worried in that the villas are genuinely not kid friendly. Given that we have 3 kids, aged 3 and under this was an issue for us. 
Once I explained to the reservations staff my worries, they agreed to erect a pool fence all the way around and also block off the upstairs. They moved the tv and DVD player rom upstairs to the main lounge.  This was definitely necessary as my boy would have tried to climb the banisters. 
The location is perfect in that its a little less than 10 minutes walk from the busy main "eat" street of seminyak, yet tucked away sufficiently far back that one does not hear any noise. 
The staff have fallen over themselves to make us feel welcome and comfortable. Every day, Anton would come and suggest restaurants to be booked and request a special table.  Out butler Bayu was also very helpful along with Ari in reservations and generally everyone we have come across. 
Each morning a whole harem of staff from Gardeners to housekeeping would come in and get our villa clean. They were always smiling and friendly to us and the children. 
The pool in my villa (11) was amazing. Soooo deep and huge. Also we requested one that gets a lot of sun and this one does. 
The room service was quick and all the food we ordered for kids was delicious. The breakfast was ok. Nothing amazing but still pretty good 
I love this villa. It's perfect for families as its like styling with the facilities of a hotel but in the piracy of ones own villa. 
I would not hesitate to come back to the layar. Thanks to the management and staff for making a very enjoyable holiday!
title: Love this place.

text: Booked a 6 night stay in The Layar and left after 3 days and still got charged for 6 nights . We are very regulard visitors to Bali and are very versed with staying in private villas in which we do 3 times per year on average . Having looked at this Villas reviews and the photos i couldnt wait to get there . Boy could it go so wrong  1. first night extremely hot airconditioning did not work which to there credit they fixed for the secong night . 2. Breakfast was 2/10 food was very poor quality and cold and presentation very ordinary , only ordered free breakfast one of the 3 days went to Kuta Ta for breakfast . 3. Room service dinner dishes and next mornings breakfast dishes sat in the sink of the villa for 2 full days until Ants had taken over . i had complained on several occasions and nothing was done until the manager of the property came to my villa after complaining and telling them imwas booking out early . 3. Towels on 2 occassions where dirty after being put fresh in the room . 4 . DVD player did not work had to be swapped over . 5 Toilet got blocked . We would have left earlier but due to high season in Bali and school holidays rooms are all booked . So on booking to go home early we were still charged for the whole 6 days with the property manager offering to compensate us with credit for a further holiday in the future , said he would leave his details and a business card on our departure which did not happen . All round very poor property that is starting to get very dated .. Wont be back....!!!!!!!
title: Nightmare Villas

text: me and my partner went to the layar villa about 3 months ago , for 6 nights , it was absolutely amazing. We had so much room to ourselves, the area was very quiet , the pool was massive and the bathroom BREATH TAKING !  There was so much privacy , and space between the villas. air conditioning was great especially on those very hot days :) its a 2 minute walk to an amazing strip of restaurants and clothes shops ...only downfalls .... MOSQUITOES !!! i was eaten alive head to toe , so make sure to buy some repellent ! also the staffs English isnt to good , so expect your breakfast order to be a bit jumbled in the morning !
title: AMAZING SPACIOUS LUXURY VILLA

text: absolutely fantastic villas couldn't fault it only complaints were they never really got the breakfast right and when we asked the staff about various trips or places to see on the island they had no information on it and not much knowledge!!
title: amazing spacious villa

text:
This week a couple of friends, my wife & I staff at these amazing villas - we were amazed how beautiful it was & how friendly & helpful all the staff were. We stayed in villa 6, a two bedroom villa - layout was excellent with a wonderful outside bathroom - both bedrooms had total privacy from each other. The swimming pool was magnificent - we couldn't keep out of it.
The only criticism I would give is that the bed's wooden edges need some work - we just kept hitting our legs & feet on them, so we had a few bruises by the end of our stay & finally why can't some of the villas in the area just club together & fix that terrible road out the front.
title: Just Beautiful

text:
My wife and I have just returned from a 10 day trip to Bali staying in a magnificent 4 bedroom villa at the Layar with friends.
To say that the four bedroom villa is luxurious is an understatement! The physical design and makeup of the villa is amazing, with every bedroom being superbly appointed and each with a  unique difference. 
The living areas and upstairs TV room are massive with plenty of room for four couples to all be together, yet allowing enough space to be private when required. 
The most talked about feature of the villa from all couples was the magnificent pool and spa area. The pool is HUGE and with terraced steps and infinity edges, it was the favourite place to hang out and avoid the heat of the day.
The staff at the villa are very friendly and responsive with any request services almost immediately. Breakfast is served each day in the villa by an attentive member of staff and the breakfasts are very well presented, plentiful and tasted great! 
The villa is well located only a 10 minute stroll from the centre of Seminyak and local beaches, and an easy walk to great restaurants and shopping.
The villas are all very private and surrounding noise is minimal, it really is your own private oasis in the middle of Seminyak!
Having the manager come and visit at the end of our stay to provide our feedback and comments was also a good initiative and further demonstrated the Layars commitment to ensuring that guests comments are taken seriously and that they are looking to improve on what  is already superior accommodations.   
We only arrived back yesterday, yet my wife and I are already missing the morning swims, great food and friendly staff. Would highly recommend the four bedroom villa to friends and families and we certainly will be looking to come back again to our little slice of Balinese paradise sometime again!
title: Superb accomodations and service!

text: This is a Luxurious Villa in a top location. Great architecture and very friendly staff. Only thing we could complain about was the jacuzzi not being heated and the staff sometimes were over the top to please ;-)
title: Luxurious Villa in top location

text: The Layar is exquisite!  The villa is spacious and open, inviting the outside in at every turn.  Beautifully appointed and every detail lovingly thought through, from the innovative bathroom design to the gorgeous main living areas.  We swam and lazed around in our own gorgeous private pool every morning and afternoon and had the most relaxing holiday in the most idyllic setting. The delicious fresh breakfast each morning was always delivered by the most friendly but unassuming house staff we have ever come across.  We ordered meals in house and they were delicious.  We also had the breath taking 6 course 'Romance Dinner' in the Villa where we had 2 top chefs and 2 servers for 4 hours.  Complete with rose petals and the most top class food in Bali, this experience was second to none.  We'll never forget it.  The team working at the Layar were always on hand to run us into the main street or to answer any questions.  We hihhly recommend the Layar and we will be back - Tracey Y
title: Paradise in Seminyak

text:
We stayed at the Layar from March 4-14th 2013. From the moment we arrived the service was excellent. We stayed in the 1 bedroom villa for 8 night and then upgraded to the 2 bedroom for 2 nights.
All of the villas are absolutely amazing. Pure paradise!!
Every single member of staff were extremely professional, friendly and so polite. We would recommended the layar villas to everyone wishing for pure luxurious accommodations in Bali.

All of the villas are a fantastic size, clean and beautiful pools. The breakfasts are served in your villa and were so nice. The staff that delivered the breakfast everyday were also just lovely.
The reception staff, security, gardeners, cleaners and infact every staff member were friendly and courteous.
title: Fantastic honeymoon villas

text:
Celebrating our 3rd Wedding anniversary at the Layar was as good if not better than our honeymoon; we had the most relaxing time in this very spacious and open villa. We swam in the beautiful pool every morning while watching our fresh breakfast being delivered poolside by the very friendly and accommodating staff, I have never had staff so willing to help out and "go beyond the call" to make us feel welcome and at home. We ate out most nights with most restaurants only a short stroll to the main eating strip, and some of the bigger more prominent eating places a short (very cheap) cab ride away. We also had our own driver for the week who took us everywhere and anywhere we wanted, without fuss and he was also a great tour guide.
We will be back, hopefully before our 4th anniversary!
title: "Most relaxing holiday for years"

locations.name: The Layar - Designer Villas and Spa

photos.caption: Veiw from the lounge where we spent a lot of time!

text:
My partner and a friend and I stayed at the Layar during the soft opening period over Xmas / New Year.  It was just magic.  Of all the villas we've stayed at (and some we've just checked out) there's none as stunning as this.  The gardens are (by Seminyak villa standards) huge with lots of lawn.  And it's in about the best location you could hope for - for eating out and shopping - between Jl Laksmana and Jl Petitenget.  
The staff are all lovely and can even make great coffee.  I showed Kadek how I liked mine made.  And the next morning, Putu (or was it Nyoman?) made our breakfast and got the coffee just right - without any intervention from me.  I've never had that in Bali. 
So..... we've just booked 8 days in May!
title: The Layar - Magic!

locations.name: The Layar - Designer Villas and Spa

text:
I stayed with my wife at The Layar at the end of February 2013. I had visited the place a year ago but most of the common areas and in particular the reception was still to be finished.

Luckily we were upgraded into a two room villa and it was like a paradise week we spent there.

While I had been travelling to Bali every now and then in the last 25 years what made the stay special was the design of the villa, the pool and he furniture. From an architectural stand point the place deserves a visit even if you are not staying there. Not sure how many villas there are but what makes the resort special is the fact that each one has a different design and a different pool shape to preserve the harmony of each land plot.

The 24/7 service was great for all our needs. Moreover we thought we were getting genuine advises and options rather than a commission based "you have to go there" kind of approach, familiar in the region. 

Breakfast were extremely generous and could be ordered according to personal taste in a variety of fashions.

Location is great and I believe most of the best restaurants of Bali are within a few minutes.

We thought that there actually was a SPA area but then realized that SPA services were provided in room...and it was great, timely and relaxing.

When travelling back to Europe we really thought this was more of a honeymoon than a week off... We will definitely stay at The Layar again...
title: My best stay in Bali: The Layar Villas

text:
Stayed at The Layar for 5D4N from end Feb'13 to 4th Mar'13. The villa we got was a 1 bedroom private pool villa. Overall stay was excellant but there are some things that can still be improved for The Layar.

Location: Very nice quiet area at Jln Pangkung Sari. It's situated about 10minutes walk to the main road of Jalan Kayu Ayer where all the fashion shops and dining areas are. (including Seminyak Square). I believe the street where The Layar is situated is still being developed as roads are rather bumpy with many pot holes. However i notice that there were at least 3-4 high end villas there for example K Villas etc.

Service: Service was excellant as the staff were very friendly and always helpful to make sure your request were being met. 

Private pool: The pool was very clean and good enough to do a few short laps and soak in.

Room: Room was indeed very clean with no smells. Queen size bedding was very comfortable with a small LCD TV inside.

Living Area: Living area was spacious with a home entertainment unit and 32inch LCD TV. Remember to bring along some CDs/DVDS or ipod to plug in so that you can enjoy some music or movies while you laze in the living room or soak in the pool. Will actually be good if they could include a fan in the living room as it tends to get rather stuffy & warm.

Kitchen: Kitchen had all the necessary full amenities (pots, pans, toaster, utencils etc) including a wine chiller. Just lack of a microwave oven to heat up your snacks. The kitchen area could be cleaner if staff took more effort to clean it up.

Bath area (Open concept): Bath area was good. Clean with 2 sinks and a rain shower. However water pressure was abit weak.

Outdoor bathtub: The outdoor bathtub was very pretty but a bit not practical as the water pressure from the tap filling the tub was like trickling....

Dining Area: Nice round table that sits 4.

Spa: As it is just the soft launch of The Layar, there was a 30% discount on the spa packages. Didnt try though.

Breakfast: Daily Breakfast selection was so so with selections of American, Continental, Layar or Indonesian breakfast. Can be improved.

Other services: Car/Bike rentals, half/full day tours, transfers etc: Pricing quite reasonable.

Overall I will rate it about 4 out of 5, with more improvements.
title: The Layar, Bali Seminyak Feb'13 - Mar'13

text: 2bedroomに滞在しました。プールも広くてリラックスできます。ブレックファーストはそれほど美味しいわけではありません。蚊はそれほどいませんでした。滞在中にバルサン？たかれました。従業員は皆親切です。日本語は全く通じません。でも拙い英語でなんとかなります。アメニティは弱く、歯ブラシ、歯磨き粉、付いてませんので、自分で用意を。Bluetooth でiphoneの音楽をリビングで流せます。滞在中、隣の部屋がやたらと大音量で音楽を流して（若いOZグループ？）やかましかったので、フロントに文句を言い、次の日から静かになりました。チェックアウトしただけかもですが。。

text:
Cari lettori,
Impossibile trovare di meglio 
Le vill sono davvero belle e non sono circondate da muri alti, vi sembreranno spazi infiniti 
I giardini super curati
L’architettura è l’interior design sono unici
Pulite ed eleganti e non troppo care rispetto alle altre offerte

Grazie e sempre bravi

text:
짜임새있는 공간과 멋진 풀장 조경이 돋보이는 풀빌라입니다. 맛있고 수준 높은 조식 메뉴가 다양하게 준비되어 있습니다. 조식을 룸서비스로도 즐길 수 있다는 사실! 직원들도 무척 친절하구요. 투숙시설이 많지 않아 한적하게 여유를 즐길 수 있어요.

다만, 빌라 연이어 붙어 있어서 옆 집에서 나는 대화 소리, 전화 벨소리가 들린다는 점 염두해두세요. 그리고 침실 이외에 거실, 주방, 욕실이 모두 야외에 있기 때문에 모기한테 좀 물려한답니다. :)

다음에는 가족 단위로 다시 방문하고 싶습니다.
title: 나만의 파라다이스

text:
官網有即時客服很棒!!我因為前兩天臨時要改住宿人數，聯絡官網客服人員，很即時地幫我解決了住宿問題

這家飯店很美很大很乾淨，游泳池很深可以盡情游泳而非單單泡水而已
早餐尤其完美，可在請他送到VILLA，現點現做很豐盛，另外咖啡他會現沖
VILLA有WIFI，但某些死角會不太穩定；有飲水機，喝水不必擔心
客服人員都親切保持微笑，很不錯的旅店

若要說缺點
因開放式空間，蚊子較多，浴室也因為是開放式空間有點熱
title: 非常棒非常超值(三臥室)

text:
위치는 스미냑 시내에서 걸어다닐순 없는 위치
완벽하게 프라이빗하게 빌라가 나뉘어져있습니다.
빌라 문을 열고 들어가는 순간 와! 했구요 
작은 정원에 수영하기에도 충분한 풀장을 갖췄습니다.
풀장옆에 조경이 훌륭했습니다.
홈페이지 사진보다 실제 가서 본 모습이 더 맘에든 유일한 호텔입니다! 
넓은 거실공간에는 직접 요리를 해먹을수 있도록 주방이 갖추어져있어서 가족단위 여행에도 적합합니다.
야외에 욕조와 화장실이 갖추어져있습니다.
모기는 피할수 없지만 멋진 공간입니다.
묵는 동안 불편한 점 없었구요, 직원들도 모두 친절합니다.
조식은 빌라로 주문해서 먹었는데 맛있었어요! 
모든것이 좋았습니다 추천!
패리스힐튼도 왔다간 리조트 라네요.
title: 완벽한 휴식을 위한 곳😍

text:
５人で３ベッドルームのヴィラに泊まりました。
ヴィラの中にはジャグジー付プール、キッチン、リビング、テーブル等揃っていて、
とても快適に過ごすことが出来ました。
朝食はアメリカン、インドネシア、ブリティッシュなどの中から選んで注文すると、
翌朝、ヴィラまで届けてくれました。
周りが静かでとても落ち着けるのと、スタッフもフレンドリーで文句ないです。
あえて言うことがあるとすれば、シャワーとバスタブが分かれているのですが、シャワーが屋外にあります。
部屋の奥にシャワー、バスタブ、トイレがあり、シャワーの部分のみ吹き抜けです。
title: プール付ヴィラでバケーション

text: Después de un mal comienzo, debido a un error en la reserva, la villa no se ajustaba a las especificaciones, el staff nos proporcionó otra que si encajaba, era espectacular, tanto por sus dimensiones, diseño, orientación, piscina, disposición, decoración, materiales, jardín y vegetación. Cabe decir que desde hace 2 años cuando las vi en el magazine HelloBali he tenido una relación de amor con estas villas, me quito el sombrero. El desayuno el mejor de todas las villas en las que he estado en Seminyak, es uno de los puntos débiles de las PRivate Villas en Bali, algunas veces pedimos cosas que no estaban incluidas, e intentaron traerlo. El servicio de Spa es genial, tuvimos un masaje de 1 hora incluido por el inconveniente de la llegada. La situación es excelente, nosotros siempre nos movemos en moto, y  se accede a tiendas y restaurantes de forma sencilla. Vimos que el servicio de mantenimiento y vigilancia era muy bueno. Sencillamente genial, volveremos sin dudarlo. Lo recomiendo 100%. Gracie.
title: Experiencia Sensorial

text: Conosco molto bene Bali e devo dire che THE LAYAR è l'Hotel Villas più bello dell'isola. Quest'anno con amici abbiamo soggiornato in 3 ville (12 - 13 - 10). Architettonicamente all'avanguardia, tetti spioventi a forma di vela, arredi di design, camere ampie e molto curate, bagni incredibili. Le piscine delle ville sono grandi e sempre pulite. Il personale è molto cortese ed operativo. Consiglio assolutamente questa struttura per chi decide di soggiornare nella zona di Semyniak. La mia recensione è vera!
title: THE BEST VILLA IN SEMYNIAK

text:
Nous sommes arrivés dans cette villa et malgré un accueil chaleureux , nous n'avons pas trouve de réponse à notre demande ! En effet , la villa était sale , le canapé troue et les chaise pleines de tâches ! Même les draps étaient douteux ... Nous avons téléphone au directeur qui nous a répondu qu'il ne voulait pas voir les détails  et a simplement dit : partez , je vois rembourse ! 
Il n'a pas cherché à faire en sorte de nettoyer ou nous changer de maison ... 
Cela devait lui paraître normal , quand á l'état de la maison !!!
 Nous en sommes partis tout de suite !
title: Pas propre du tout !

text:
The Layar is een relatief nieuw project, en wat is het goed gelukt! We verbleven in villa #12, 3 slaapkamers. Na de entree en een trapje omhoog waan je jezelf in een paradijselijke omgeving. De tuinen zijn mooi aangelegd en geven je het gevoel dat je niet omringd bent door andere villas, er is een jacuzzi apart van het zwembad, een prachtig houten deck en een zwembad waar je baantjes in kunt trekken. 

De slaapkamer waar ik verbleef grensde aan dit deck en het zwembad, dus bij het ontwaken en openen van de gordijnen waren de tuin en de pool het eerste wat je zag. In deze villa is bijna alles open, vooral de living buiten is een pluspunt. Zelfs wanneer het regent biedt het dak (in de vorm van een zeil - layar) je daar bescherming tegen en kun je buiten blijven zitten. Verder is er een ruime keuken en een tv hoek, maar eigenlijk hebben we de gehele maand buiten doorgebracht. Wat betreft de housekeeping - er wordt iedere dag schoongemaakt zoals in een hotel, wat heel plezierig is. Je hoeft nergens over na te denken. Ook de tuin en het zwembad worden gedaan, er was vrijwel geen bladblaadje te vinden :) 

Het personeel is ontzettend aardig, vooral David van de front office weet wat hospitality betekent. Op het terrein rijdt een wagentje rond die je heen en weer brengt bij aankomst bij de receptie, als je een dag weg wil met een chauffeur is dit ook mogelijk. 

Qua eten/drinken heb je de keuze om roomservice te bestellen van een zeer uitgebreid menu. Je kunt hierbij kiezen voor een internationale/indonesische/italiaanse keuken, dus voor ieder wat wils. Ook voor kinderen is er een apart menu en dus ook geschikt voor gezinnen. De kwaliteit van het eten is goed, houd er wel rekening mee dat het even duurt voordat je het hebt. De front office vraagt je iedere dag wat voor ontbijt je wil hebben de volgende ochtend, hierbij heb je keuze uit 4 verschillende 'pakketten', american/continental/indonesian/the layar breakfast. Ook allemaal lekker en vers!

Eigenlijk kun je the Layar zien als een 5+ sterren hotel, maar met je eigen huis en je eigen vrijheid. Dit is een heerlijke combinatie, omdat het je de mogelijkheid biedt om nergens over na te hoeven denken. 

Tot volgend jaar!
title: Aanrader!

locations.name: The Layar - Designer Villas and Spa
The Layar - Designer Villas and Spa

text: Heel erg genoten in the Layar. Heel fijne villa's: ruim, schoon, mooi, fijne bedden, keuken etc. Lief personeel soms nog wat onervaren maar de ervaring maakt alles goed. Super locatie, dichtbij de leuke spots.
title: Aanrader

text:
Nous avons séjourné dans une villa 1 chambre pendant 4 nuits.
Nous avons été un peu déçus à notre arrivée, car nous nous attendions à une plus grande surface de jardin. 
Si vous comptez prendre le soleil, les villas 1 chambre ne sont pas pour vous!!
Le jardin est bien trop petit, et en plus il est trop ombragé!
Nous n'avons rien à signaler sur le service, le personnel est très accueillant, à l'écoute, et très serviable. Petit point négatif : le room service n'est ouvert que de 11h à 22h.
Concernant l'emplacement de l'hôtel, il est très bien situé, proche de la ville.
Cependant nous pensons quand même que le rapport qualité/prix de cet hôtel n'est pas intéressant, bien trop cher par rapport à ce que l'on peut trouver sur Bali.
title: Manque de soleil!!!!
